A2 the number 80: seventy-nine, eighty, eight-one They've invited eighty (guests) to the wedding.
More examplesFewer examplesThe computer screen displays eighty characters per line.It's not unusual for a junior doctor to work a seventy or sometimes an eighty hour week.We had eighty applicants for the job, but we've whittled them down to six.Together they must earn over eighty thousand dollars a year.My dad is going to be eighty on Sunday and we're having a big party to celebrate.
